entries.auto_loot_fail: You are too far away to loot %TT.
entries.avatar_create_confirm_cancel: If you go back, this avatar's configuration will be discarded. Do you want to discard this avatar?
entries.avatar_delete_confirm: To confirm the deletion of this character, please type the following in the area below, then press Ok:
entries.avatar_delete_notmatch: The text you entered is not an exact case-sensitive match as required. The character will not be deleted.
entries.avatar_err_avatar_not_found: Sorry, but the game cannot load this character. This is most likely caused by a corrupted file in your game installation. Please contact Customer  Support for assistance, or try logging in a different character.
entries.avatar_err_name_none: Please enter a name for your character.
entries.avatar_err_no_species_selected: You need to select a species to create your character. Select one of the choices from the menu, then click on the NEXT button.
entries.avatar_location_desc_unavailable: pcontrast1 All Travel Routes to this Starting Location are currently unavailable..
entries.avatar_location_unavailable: All Travel Routes to that Starting Location are currently unavailable.  Please choose a different Starting Location.
entries.avatar_select_location_failed: Your location selection cannot be satisfied at this time. All transports to the selected location are full.
entries.avatar_wait_random_name: Generating a name for your character...  please wait.
entries.avatar_wait_select_location: Please wait while the server processes your selection...
entries.avatar_wait_transport_location: Waiting for the transport to arrive...
entries.bind_conflict_cannot_overwrite_prose: "%TU" conflicts with a binding for "%TT". You cannot overwrite the binding for "%TT".
entries.bind_conflict_prose: "%TU" conflicts with a binding for "%TT". Do you want to overwrite this binding?
entries.bind_delete_cannot_delete_prose: You cannot delete the binding for "%TT".
entries.chair_out_of_range: You are too far away to sit on that.
entries.change_friend_without_saving: You appear to have changed your current friend entry.  Would you like to save these changes before you change to a new friend entry?
entries.chat_log_file_size_kb: Current chat log file size: %TT KB
entries.chat_log_file_size_mb: Current chat log file size: %TT MB
entries.chat_tab_confirm_reset_defaults: This will undo any customization you have done to the chat tabs and chat box. Are you sure you want to reset the default chat tabs?
entries.close_friend_without_saving: You appear to have changed your current friend entry.  Would you like to save these changes before you close the window?
entries.cluster_definition: A galaxy is a complete Star Wars playing environment.  Each galaxy is its own, separate community.  If you have friends playing Star Wars Galaxies, be sure to ask them what galaxy they are playing on so you can join them!  Once you have decided, select the "Next" button below so that you can create your character.
entries.confirm_exit_game: Are you sure you want to exit Star Wars Galaxies?
entries.confirm_give_item_drag_drop: Are you sure you wish to use these two items together?
entries.confirm_go_home: Really hyperspace to ground launch location?
entries.confirm_train_expertise: Are you sure you wish to train this area of expertise?
entries.confirm_train_expertises: Are you sure you wish to train these areas of expertise?
entries.consent_imagedesign: %TT wishes to change your appearance.  Allow it?
entries.cpt_help_avatar_cust: Customize the appearance of your Character.
entries.cpt_help_avatar_location: Select your destination by clicking on one of the planets on the screen, then choose a city from the selection box to the right.
entries.cpt_help_avatar_sel: Choose the Character you would like to play now. You may also choose to Create a new Character, or Delete one of your existing Characters.
entries.cpt_help_avatar_setup_prof: Choose your starting clothes for your character by selecting with the mouse.  Note this clothing selection is visual only; you can always choose to become anything you like.
entries.cpt_help_avatar_species_sel: Choose the Species and Gender for your new Character.
entries.cpt_help_avatar_summary: Review the Abilities, Name, and Biography of your Character.  When you are satisfied, press the Next arrow to begin the Game!
entries.cpt_help_cluster_sel: Select the Galaxy where you would like to make a new Character.
entries.datapad_wp_current_planet_only: Only show waypoints on current planet
entries.datapad_wp_single_mode: Activate a single waypoint at a time.
entries.err_start_location_beta: This starting location is not currently available.
entries.expgrant_imagedesigner: You have gained Image Designer experience!
entries.im_bad_target_format: To send a /tell message, type /tell, then a space, followed by the names of each tell recipient separated by commas.
entries.im_failed_insufficient_privs_prose: Your message to %TU was not sent because it was too long.
entries.im_failed_unknown_prose: Your /tell to %TU failed for an unknown reason. This is because of a chat server error. Please type /bug and submit the details of how you received this message.
entries.im_no_message: You need to include a message!
entries.im_no_reply_target: You can't reply unless you have received a /tell recently!
entries.im_no_retell_target: You can't retell unless you have sent a /tell recently!
entries.im_no_targets: You need to specify a target for your /tell.
entries.im_recipient_ignored_prose: You sent a tell but %TU is ignoring messages from you.
entries.im_recipient_invalid_prose: There is no person by the name '%TU' in this Galaxy.
entries.im_tell_usage: Syntax for /tell:    /tell <target> <message>   /tell <target>,<target>,...,<target> <message> NOTE: do not put spaces between the target names when sending to multiple targets.
entries.im_ttell_no_target: You must have a player targeted to use this command.
entries.inv_object_destroyed_prose: The container you were inspecting, %TT,  is no longer available.
entries.inv_out_of_range_prose: You are out of range of %TT; it has been closed.
entries.lots_over_limit_spam: YOU ARE %DI LOTS OVER THE LOT LIMIT!!!
entries.macro_badcommand1: This command is not allowed in macros:
entries.mood_desc_has_animation: This mood has a visual effect.
entries.msg_login_fail: You were unable to connect to the Login Server. This is the server that allows you to select a character.  The inability to connect could be because of a failure in the Internet connection between your machine and the Login Server, or it could be because the Login Server is unavailable.  Please check that your connection to the Internet is alive and well; if the problem persists, try again in a little while. You should also check the game website at   http://www.starwarsgalaxies.com  to see if there is a known issue. Sometimes there are scheduled downtimes for the Login  Server.  If you still cannot connect, please contact Customer Service. Sorry for the inconvenience!
entries.msg_truncated_spatial: Your spatial chat message was truncated because it was too long.
entries.name_declined_cant_create_avatar: You have sent an invalid message to the server while attempting to create a character name.  It is possible that you have received this message in error, in which case you should contact Customer Service.  It is also possible that you were doing this intentionally in order to attempt to hack the character creation process. Hacking the Star Wars Galaxies servers is a violation of the Terms of Service and can result in account termination and legal action.
entries.name_declined_developer: Your character name is not acceptable. It is too similar to a name we have reserved.  Please try again with a different name.
entries.name_declined_empty: You can't create a character without a name! Please enter a name, or use the GENERATE A NAME! button to have us generate one for you.
entries.name_declined_fictionally_reserved: We're sorry, but we do not allow characters to be created using the names of major Star Wars characters or planets from the Star Wars universe.  Please select another name and try again.
entries.name_declined_in_use: We're sorry, but that name is already in use by someone else.  We realize that the selected name may be one that you are very attached to; however, our current naming policy requires that first names be unique.  We suggest that you either try a different Galaxy where the name may not be in use, or alter the spelling of the name to try to make it unique.
entries.name_declined_internal_error: The name approval process has suffered an internal error.  Please report this problem to Customer Service,  and try entering your name again.
entries.name_declined_no_name_generator: You have sent an invalid message to the server while attempting to create a character name.  It is possible that you have received this message in error, in which case you should contact Customer Service.  It is also possible that you were doing this intentionally in order to attempt to hack the character creation process. Hacking the Star Wars Galaxies servers is a violation of the Terms of Service and can result in account termination and legal action.
entries.name_declined_no_template: You have sent an invalid message to the server while attempting to create a character name.  It is possible that you have received this message in error, in which case you should contact Customer Service.  It is also possible that you were doing this intentionally in order to attempt to hack the character creation process. Hacking the Star Wars Galaxies servers is a violation of the Terms of Service and can result in account termination and legal action.
entries.name_declined_not_authorized_for_species: You do not have the expansion required to use that species.
entries.name_declined_not_creature_template: You have sent an invalid message to the server while attempting to create a character name.   It is possible that you have received this message in error, in which case you should contact Customer Service.  It is also possible that you were doing this intentionally in order to attempt to hack the character creation process. Hacking the Star Wars Galaxies servers is a violation of the Terms of Service and can result in account termination and legal action.
entries.name_declined_number: Your character's name has been declined because of its syntax. The following rules must be followed in entering names:  - Capital letters are only allowed at the beginning of words. - No punctuation except for the apostrophe (') and the dash (-). Some species cannot use these. - The name and the surname must each be one word only. - No numbers are allowed.
entries.name_declined_profane: Your selected name has been declined because it may contain inappropriate language.   We realize that computers are fallible, and that if you keep trying, you may be able to fool the name filter. However, inappropriate language in names is against our Terms of Service.  If your character is reported for an inappropriate name by another player, you may have the name changed or lose the character. We therefore suggest that you keep it clean. Thanks!  Please select another name and try again.
entries.name_declined_racially_inappropriate: Your character name is not suitable for this species.    - All names must be at least 3 characters long.   - Names can be no longer than 15 characters.   - Surnames can be no longer than 20 characters.  Different species have different rules on what is permissible.    - Humans and Twi'leks may have one hyphen (-) or apostrophe (') in their name or surname.   - Mon Calamari can have a hyphen in their name or surname.   - Wookiees are not allowed a surname.  Please try again with a different name.
entries.name_declined_reserved: We're sorry, but that name contains a word that we do not allow in character names. Please try again with a new name.
entries.name_declined_retry: The character naming process suffered an internal error. Please try entering your character's name again.
entries.name_declined_syntax: Your character's name has been declined because of its syntax. The following rules must be followed in entering names:  - Capital letters are only allowed at the beginning of words. - No punctuation except for the apostrophe (') and the dash (-). Some species cannot use these. - The name and the surname must each be one word only. - No numbers are allowed.
entries.name_declined_too_fast: You are not allowed to create a character more than once every 15 minutes.  Please try again later.
entries.no_sitting_in_water: You cannot sit down in water.
entries.no_trade_shared_tooltip: This item is marked No Trade Shared, meaning if the item is currently inside a building, and is not currently contained inside another item, it can be picked up by an admin character on the same account as the character who currently owns the item.
entries.no_trade_tooltip: This item is marked No Trade.
entries.profanity_filter_off: You are no longer using the profanity filter.
entries.profanity_filter_on: You are now using the profanity filter.
entries.radar_tooltip_con_mode: Check this box to enable circles around enemies indicating their difficulty.
entries.rate_header_tooltip: Select a rating by using the buttons below. A rating on the far left means the content wasn't what you were hoping for. A rating on the far right is content that exceeded your expectations.
entries.recommended_cluster: We recommend that your character play in this galaxy.
entries.res_activatedwithoutresource: Please select a resource before activating the machine.
entries.res_confirm_dump_hopper: Are you sure you want to dump the hopper's contents?
entries.res_confirm_dumpall_hopper: Really destroy ALL resources in the harvester?
entries.res_err_empty_hopper: The resource harvester was unable to empty the hopper. This is indicative of a server problem. Please contact Customer Service for assistance.
entries.res_harvest_selectresource: Select a resource to harvest from the list below
entries.res_pleaseselectresource: Please select a resource to manage.
entries.res_setres_text: Select a resource to harvest from the list below.
entries.sample_text: Adjust the slider to change the font size for this chat window.
entries.scene_no_scene_selected: You need to select a scene.
entries.server_avatar_deleted_failed: The server failed to delete your character. This is indicative of a server problem. Please try again.
entries.server_central_cxn_failed: That Galaxy is unavailable at the moment.  The connection to the Central Server failed.
entries.server_character_creation_max_chars: Sorry, you are not allowed to create any more characters on this Galaxy.
entries.server_character_creation_refused: Sorry, you can't create a character on that Galaxy right now.
entries.server_cluster_address_missing: Error: the server cluster address is missing, so the address for the server is unknown. Please report this to Customer Service.
entries.server_cluster_full: That Galaxy is full.  Please choose a different Galaxy.
entries.server_cluster_login_failed: The connection to the selected Galaxy failed. Please try again later.
entries.server_cluster_wait_populate: Please wait while the Galaxy List is populated...
entries.server_confirm_avatar_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
entries.server_connection_cxn_closed: The connection to the Galaxy has closed.  Please try again.
entries.server_connection_loading: That server is currently loading, please wait...
entries.server_connection_locked: That server is currently locked, please wait...
entries.server_connection_restricted: That Galaxy is restricted.  Please choose another Galaxy.
entries.server_connection_unavailable: You cannot connect to that Galaxy at this time.   The connection server is unavailable. Please try again later.
entries.server_dialog_create_jedi: You have an available pcontrast1 FORCE SENSITIVE CHARACTER SLOT.!  You are now creating a pcontrast1 Jedi character.!
entries.server_dialog_create_jedi_or_regular: You have an available pcontrast1 FORCE SENSITIVE CHARACTER SLOT.!  Would you like to create a pcontrast1 Jedi character. now?
entries.server_err_avatar_not_found: The selected character was not found!   This indicates a server issue. Please contact Customer Support.
entries.server_err_no_cluster_selected: Please select a Galaxy to log in.
entries.server_err_no_username: Please enter a username and  password to log in.
entries.server_login_cxn_failed: The Login Server is currently not available. Please try again later.
entries.server_login_cxn_opened: The connection to the Login Server is now open...
entries.server_login_cxn_reset: Your connection to the Login Server has been reset.
entries.server_timeout_gameserver: The connection to the Galaxy has timed out.
entries.skill_command_acquired_prose: You have acquired a new ability: %TU!
entries.skill_confirm_surrender: Are you sure you want to surrender this skill?
entries.skill_delete_confirm: To confirm the surrendering of this skill, please type "yes" (minus the quotes) in the area below, then press Ok:
entries.skill_delete_incorrect_text: The text you entered was not correct. The skill will not be surrendered.
entries.skill_qualify: You now qualify for the skill:
entries.stat_help_action: This attribute defines the size of your ACTION pool.  Besides representing how "energetic" you feel, the pool can be expended to execute special moves.  If this pool value reaches 0, you become incapacitated.
entries.stat_help_constitution: This attribute affects the regeneration rate of your HEALTH pool.  The higher the attribute, the faster you will generate points in this pool.
entries.stat_help_focus: This attribute affects the efficiency of your MIND pool.  The higher this attribute, the fewer points it takes to execute moves that cost points from this pool.
entries.stat_help_health: This attribute defines the size of your HEALTH pool.  Besides representing the number of hit points you have, the pool can be expended to execute special moves.  If this pool value reaches 0, you become incapacitated.
entries.stat_help_main: This is the stat migration page.  You can move attribute points from one pool to another, within the constraints of your race.  The values set at character creation will be appropriate for your profession, but you may want to adjust them as your character grows and progresses.  The actual movement of your attributes does not happen instantly, but migrates over time.
entries.stat_help_mind: This attribute defines the size of your MIND pool.  Besides representing your mental status, the pool can be expended to execute special moves.  If this pool value reaches 0, you become incapacitated.
entries.stat_help_quickness: This attribute affects the efficiency of your ACTION pool.  The higher this attribute, the fewer points it takes to execute moves that cost points from this pool.
entries.stat_help_stamina: This attribute affects the regeneration rate of your ACTION pool.  The higher the attribute, the faster you will generate points in this pool.
entries.stat_help_strength: This attribute affects the efficiency of your HEALTH pool.  The higher this attribute, the fewer points it takes to execute moves that cost points from this pool.
entries.stat_help_willpower: This attribute affects the regeneration rate of your MIND pool.  The higher the attribute, the faster you will generate points in this pool.
entries.sui_obj_lost: You have lost the target, closing interface.
entries.sui_out_of_range_prose: You have gone out of range of %TT, closing interface.
entries.survey_help_map: This is the survey map. Once you survey, the results are seen here.  A waypoint is also automatically created at the highest concentration location surveyed.
entries.survey_help_reslist: This table displays the resources that this particular tool can attempt to survey.
entries.survey_help_samplebutton: Click this button to attempt to obtain a small sample of the selected resource.
entries.survey_help_surveybutton: Click this button to survey for the selected resource.
entries.survey_noresource: You must select a resource for this tool from the Inventory before you can do this.
entries.survey_notool: You must use a survey tool once from the Inventory before you can do this.
entries.tcg_exit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game?
entries.test_pp: This is a test. TU=%TU, TT=%TT, TO=%TO, DI=%DI, DF=%DF.
entries.tooltip_defaultaction: This action is currently your default action.
entries.tooltip_notification_icon: A communique is waiting for you.  Click here to receive it.
entries.tooltip_notifications_icon: A Note is waiting - Click Here
entries.tooltip_viewer_3d_controls: Click & Drag with the Left Mouse Button to move the object.
entries.tooltip_wrongweapon: You cannot perform this action at this range.
entries.travel_loading: Please wait while Travel Information Downloads...
entries.waypoint_name: Enter the new name of the waypoint.
entries.tooltip_hide_closed: This option will hide characters on galaxies that are no longer available.
entries.no_trade_removable_tooltip: If you are the owner of this item, you can use the item's radial menu to remove No Trade from the item.
